title: Looking for Type like Trade Gothic LH Bold but more rounded
content:
I'm looking for a type face that has a similar aspect ration to Trade Gothic LH Bold but is more rounded.

It's is for a logo project.

Any recommendations?

----
author: evanluke

comments.content:
Do you mean  
a) Bold Condensed No. 20  
b) Bold No. 2  
c) or?

Show it!

Here is the sample:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100417082334im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lightline_3757.gif)

I guess it's Trade Gothic Extended Bold. I like the aspect ratio but I want something bolder and slightly more rounded.

Thanks for responding!

When you say "rounded", do you mean soft ends? If you want something heavier than this, you're getting into [VAG](http://web.archive.org/web/20100417082334/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/creative_alliance/vag_rounded_std_complete_vp/) and [Frankfurter](http://web.archive.org/web/20100417082334/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/itc/frankfurter_std_virtual/) territory.

Or perhaps you mean "rounded corners", in which case [Magistral](http://web.archive.org/web/20100417082334/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/paratype/magistral_extra_bold_ot/) or [FF Max](http://web.archive.org/web/20100417082334/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_max_ot_black/) may fit the bill.

But either way, there's nothing good that is rounded, heavy, _and_ this wide.
